message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $1,100,000. I believe this offer reflects the significant value it will bring to your business.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950,000. I hope this aligns better with my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but the value of this product to your business is undeniable.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,050,000.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter your offer with $1,000,000. This price better aligns with my budget while still acknowledging the value of the product.
